code: import axios from"axios";export var getAllMessage=function getAllMessage(){return axios.get("/api/inbox/all");};export var getMessageById=function getMessageById(id){return axios.get("/api/inbox",{data:id});};export var deleteMessage=function deleteMessage(message){return axios.post("/api/inbox/delete",message);};export var addNewMessage=function addNewMessage(message){return axios.post("/api/inbox/add",message);};export var updateMessage=function updateMessage(message){return axios.post("/api/inbox/update",message);};
